title: Does YouTube allow you to monetize cover songs? - Quora

response.answer_text: Granted that you’re a YouTube partner, most of the time YouTube allows you to split the monetisation on your cover songs with the original artist, but you have to go through a few steps to enable this monetisation. Check out this page about Monetizing eligible cover videos, scroll down to the bottom and follow the five steps. Best of luck!

Creators participating in the youtube Partner Program can share revenue from eligible cover song videos on youtube, once music publisher owners claim those videos. you'll be paid revenue for these videos on a pro rata basis
